{"id":777756796,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 days, 12 hours","timestamp":1660915313,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/777756796/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        vector <int> leftheight(n);\n        vector <int> rightheight(n);\n        leftheight[0] = height[0];\n        for(int i =1 ;i<height.size();i++){\n            leftheight[i]  =max(height[i],leftheight[i-1]);\n        }\n        rightheight[n-1] = height[n-1];\n        for(int i = n-2;i>=0;i--){\n            rightheight[i] = max(height[i],rightheight[i+1]);\n        }\n        int ans =0;\n        for(int i =0 ;i<n;i++){\n            ans += (min(leftheight[i],rightheight[i]))-height[i];\n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
